name: gulp-ember-emblem
description: gulp.js plugin for Emblem.js templates with Ember

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report $(if [ "$TRAVIS" ]; then echo lcovonly; else echo html; fi) -- && if [ "$TRAVIS" ]; then cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls; fi

author: Whitney Young
